adept.common
Class ScriptLink

java.lang.Object
  adept.common.ScriptLink

public final class ScriptLink
extends Object

Represents a link between two script events. The semantics of such links are algorithm-dependant. All script-related classes are "locally immutable" so long as the IType implementation used is. However, they all inherit from the mutable HltContent class, whose associated fields are mutable. The Object.hashCode() and Object.equals(Object) implementations are the default.

getLinkType

public IType getLinkType()
Returns the type of the link between the events. Refer to the ontology used by the algorithm producing this for interpretation.

Returns:
Will never be null.
